content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and the excellent condition of the newly built apartment, my initial budget is tight. I would like to start the negotiations with an offer much lower than the market rate, around 450 Euros per month. I hope you understand my financial situation as a student and am confident we can reach an agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your financial situation, but 450 Euros per month is far below my expectations. I am looking for a fair market price for this apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for hearing me out. While I'm not looking to pay the maximum price, I'm also aware of the apartment's value. How about we meet halfway and consider 550 Euros per month? This would still be a considerable discount for the landlord but more suitable for my budget as a student.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 550 Euros per month is still far below my expectations. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a fair market price for this apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your stance, but as a student, I must prioritize my expenses. I understand the apartment's worth but am limited in my ability to pay more. Would you consider 580 Euros per month as a compromise? It would provide a slightly better income for you while still allowing me to manage my finances as a student.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 580 Euros per month is still below my expectations. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a fair market price for this apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that my most recent offer doesn't meet your expectations. In this case, I'm unable to proceed with a lower proposal as my financial situation doesn't allow for greater compromise. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my budget restrictions have been clearly stated. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
